!INDEX.html              Long index format
Clobberd-2.9.tgz         user regulator
Slay.1.2.tar.gz          kills all of a user's processes

idled-1.02c.tar.gz       kicks off idle users
idled-1.12.tar.gz        kills idle login shells - fairly configurable
idlekiller.gz            kills idle processes, not users
idleout-mcm.tar.gz       Automatically logs out idle users
kidled-0.4.tar.gz        kick idle users off the system
